00046         #region Contents
00047         internal override void LoadContent()
00048         {
00049             creditTexture = _GLOBAL.ContentManager.Load<Texture2D>(@"sprites\credit");
00050             background = _GLOBAL.ContentManager.Load<Texture2D>(@"sprites\background");
00051         }

00056         #region Update and Draw
00057         internal override void Update(GameTime gameTime)
00058         {
00059             _GLOBAL.InputHandler.keyboardState = Keyboard.GetState();
00060 
00061             NeedDraw = true;
00062             NeedUpdate = true;
00063 
00064             /* Return to menu if Esc is pressed */
00065             if (_GLOBAL.InputHandler.isKeyEscape())
00066             {
00067                 NeedUpdate = false;
00068                 NeedDraw = false;
00069                 _GLOBAL.inGameState = false;
00070                 init();
00071             }
00072 
00073             for (int i = 0; i < 5; ++i)
00074             {
00075                 creditPos[i] = new Vector2(creditPos[i].X, creditPos[i].Y - 2);
00076             }
00077 
00078 
00079             if (creditPos[0].Y < -250)
00080             {
00081                 transition = true;
00082                 aplhaValue += 0.005f;
00083             }
00084 
00085             if (creditPos[0].Y < -900)
00086             {
00087                 NeedUpdate = false;
00088                 NeedDraw = false;
00089                 _GLOBAL.inGameState = false;
00090                 _GLOBAL.GameStateManager.GameStates.Remove(this);
00091                 init();
00092             }
00093             _GLOBAL.InputHandler.previousKeyboardState = _GLOBAL.InputHandler.keyboardState;
00094 
00095         }
00096 
00097         internal override void Draw(GameTime gameTime)
00098         {
00099             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.Begin(SpriteBlendMode.AlphaBlend);
00100             if (transition)
00101                 _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.Draw(background, _GLOBAL.ViewportRect, Color.White);
00102 
00103             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.Draw(creditTexture, _GLOBAL.ViewportRect, new Color(255.0f, 255.0f, 255.0f, (float)Math.Cos(aplhaValue)));
00104             for (int i = 0; i < credits.Count; ++i)
00105             {
00106                 _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.DrawString(_GLOBAL.SpriteFont, credits[i], creditPos[i], Color.White);
00107             }
00108             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.End();
00109         }
00110         #endregion
00111 
00112         #region Methods
00113         private void init()
00114         {
00115             creditPos.Clear();
00116             for (int i = 0; i < credits.Count; ++i)
00117             {
00118                 /* Center aligns all text */
00119                 creditPos.Add(new Vector2(_GLOBAL.Viewport.Width / 2 - _GLOBAL.SpriteFont.MeasureString(credits[i]).X / 2,
00120                 _GLOBAL.Viewport.Height + i * (_GLOBAL.HuakanFont.MeasureString(credits[i]).Y + 5)));
00121             }
00122 
00123             transition = false;
00124             aplhaValue = 0;
00125         }
